value: content=Beautiful bar and best pizza in all of Istra. They deliver, and the locals partake in it often as well.

content=Enter the world of comfort, quality and style in Maistra hotels and resorts in two beautiful and colorful Mediterranean towns - Rovinj and Vrsar. 
High-end accommodation, excellent service, the best amenities and our experience and expertise create a perfect blend with the surrounding area, turning our hotels and resorts into an ideal choice for a weekend getaway, holiday, active or Wellness & Spa holiday or a business trip.
Maistra features hotel Pineta and 6 resorts in Vrsar(Belvedere, Petalon, Funtana, Riva, Naturist park Koversada Villas and Naturist park Koversada Apartments).

content=Maistra's campsites are awarded as best campsites in Croatia. All campsites are located near the sea and most of them also offer swimming pools. Campsites in Vrsar: Valkanela, Porto Sole and Naturist park Koversada Campsite.
